Here are two more options for you:

1. Attention all shoppers! JDE Shopee SG's SSS Sale is just around the corner, happening on 25th February. Get ready to enjoy up to 50% off on a wide range of products, vouchers worth up to $13 off, and a buy one get one free offer on L'OR Crema Absolu Profond Coffee Beans.
